data.name: Fair Isle Snowflake Lumbar Cushion Cover

mainimage.alt: Fair Isle Snowflake Lumbar Cushion Cover

data.short_description: Keeping a distinctive complex pattern without being complicated involves choosing a simple palette. The poinsettia red and ivory white in this cushion cover are two lovely colors that we enjoy all season long. The sweater-like snowflake design celebrates more than one type of holiday (reverse is sherpa-like sheepskin). Make it a snow day. The front is made of 100% yarn-dyed acrylic; It is reversed to 100% recycled polyester sherpa in white. Yarn dyed fabric has amazing vivid colors that keep their radiance over time. Holds 16 "x 26" fill (sold separately).

data.name: Desk Lamp Ezra
data.short_description: Craftsmanship and practical functionality come together in our eye-catching accent lamp. Crafted from tough ceramic with gently curved contours, Ezra is hand finished with a reactive glaze that imparts a rich, varied tone and unique character. Made of ceramic with a reactive Teal Glazed finish applied by hand. Pluggable. The lamp has an on / off switch located in the socket. Transparent PVC cord. UL Listed Dry. It has capacity for 1 bulb type A of 60 W or equivalent to LED (not included). E26 plug.

data.name: Murano Table Lamp
data.short_description: Thick metal bands surround our blown glass chandelier to give it a rustic, handcrafted look that gives it a warm glow in a variety of settings. Made from blown glass with a bronze coated aluminum band covering the top and bottom. The hand-applied finish is polished, stained and sealed with lacquer. On / off switch. This lamp fits our Pottery Barn lampshades. The screen is sold separately.

data.name: Paxton Pendant Lamp
data.short_description: Blown glass in an eclectic mix of shapes, the shades of our pendant light have a soft mottled texture and a subtle green hue. Each glass lamp is suspended from a round cover with black fabric cable. Made of molded glass and steel finished with bronze. Professional installation is recommended. Each lamp is sold separately.

data.name: Two Tone Rattan Tray
data.short_description: Handwoven from textured rattan, our tray brings a note of natural beauty to your home. Its earthy material features a blend of black and white graphic strands that play a contemporary counterpoint to organic fiber. With handles for portability, the tray offers a handy accessory for accessories, books, and candles. Handwoven from rattan and wire. Lead Free.

data.name: Andie Mat
data.short_description: Inspired by an antique rug, the Andie faux rug features a bold pattern that can easily update the space. Layer it with your favorite neutral rug for a bohemian-inspired look. Eco-friendly polyester fiber made from recycled plastic bottles makes this durable mat a perfect choice for high-traffic areas.

description.text: Inspired by an antique rug, the Andie faux rug features a bold pattern that can easily update the space. Layer it with your favorite neutral rug for a bohemian-inspired look. Eco-friendly polyester fiber made from recycled plastic bottles makes this durable mat a perfect choice for high-traffic areas.

specs.spec_value: Vacuum frequently on low power using a beater brushless vacuum to prevent debris from depositing on the fiber roots. Clean up spills immediately; if liquid, blot with a clean, undyed cloth, pressing firmly around the spilled liquid to absorb as much as possible. It can be rinsed periodically with an open air hose and mild soap. For stubborn stains, a professional mat cleaning is recommended. For indoor / outdoor use. The use of a mat protector is recommended

data.name: Carter Table Lamp
data.short_description: Finished in brass and champagne, the elongated, open frame gives our Carter collection its graceful appearance. The delicate geometric design takes up little space and has French wiring for a classic accent. Made of steel with a hand applied champagne brass finish. Power switch in socket. Screen not included.

description.text: Finished in brass and champagne, the elongated, open frame gives our Carter collection its graceful appearance. data.name: Bentley mirror
data.short_description: The affinity for mid-century décor means having a craving for minimal orientation and ultimate style. That's exactly what drew us to this bentwood-framed mirror. It's striking and seamless, and the understated walnut finish is as smooth as the frame.

description.text: The affinity for mid-century décor means having a craving for minimal orientation and ultimate style. That's exactly what drew us to this bentwood-framed mirror. It's striking and seamless, and the understated walnut finish is as smooth as the frame.

specs.spec_value: Solid boxwood with mirrored glass. Backed with MDF

data.name: Colossal Pillowcase
data.short_description: The chunky yarn forms a distinctive pillowcase that is extra stylish and extra cozy, yet surprisingly light and soft. Handwoven, these are the heirloom decorations your sofa never knew it needed. The front is woven in 100% acrylic, the reverse is woven in 100% cotton. The pillow has a 100% polyester lining. STANDARD 100 certified by OEKO-TEX®. Independent laboratory tested and verified safe against over 350 harmful substances. Dyed fibers for long-lasting and vibrant color. Reversible to a uniform color. Zip closure. Holds a 61cm2 fill (sold separately).

Combine it with one of our screens (sold separately) and place it on a console or buffet to create ambient lighting. Made from recycled clear glass. Combine with any of our Small or Extra Large Mix & Match screens (all screens sold separately). On / off switch.

data.name: Bathrobe Disney Mickey Mouse
data.short_description: Brighten up your space with the all-magic mascot: Disney's Mickey Mouse. And we don't just mean decoration. Why not pay tribute to one of the world's most famous people with this hooded robe complete with Mickey ears.

description.text: Brighten up your space with the all-magic mascot: Disney's Mickey Mouse. And we don't just mean decoration. Why not pay tribute to one of the world's most famous people with this hooded robe complete with Mickey's ears.

data.name: Linen Jersey Queen Size Bedspread
data.short_description: With all the softness of a well-loved t-shirt, our Belgian linen bedspread dresses the bed in a relaxed and carefree look. Breathable bedding combines two of our most beloved fabrics: iconic Belgian linen and ultra-soft cotton jersey. Proudly manufactured in a Fair Trade Certified ™ factory, the fabric regulates heat by adjusting to hot or cold environments for year-round layered comfort. 100% jersey linen fabric. Reverse 75% cotton and 25% vegetable-woven linen. Breathable Belgian linen is great for warm or cool temperatures, and its durability allows you to love it for years. Soft and cool to the touch. STANDARD 100 certified by OEKO-TEX®. Independent laboratory tested and verified safe against over 350 harmful substances. Fair Trade Certified ™. Purchasing this product helps ensure fair and safe work practices, improve livelihoods, and empower workers to invest in their communities.

specs.spec_value: Wash before first use. Machine wash warm on gentle cycle. Use only non-chlorine bleach, if necessary. Dry on low heat. To ensure the vibrant color of the towel, do not use harsh chemicals or facial products.

data.name: Classic Organic Loop Mat
data.short_description: There's nothing like stepping on a bath mat that looks like a cloud after a shower, and ours is the softest and fluffiest you'll find. It is made of pure organic fleece-type cotton for extra softness. Pottery Barn is a proud member of the Better Cotton Initiative. Our cotton products support the most sustainable cotton farming. This product meets the strict requirements of the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS), the world's leading processing standard for organic textiles to ensure a healthier home for you and a better planet for everyone.

data.name: Forest Gnome King Size Pillowcase
data.short_description: There is no gnome place home. Illustrating a fairytale forest scene, this artwork was originally hand painted by our in-house design team to add a touch of Christmas magic to your bed. More respectful with the environment and healthier for your home, we make this bedding with organically grown cotton. OEKO-TEX® STANDARD 100 Certified - Tested against over 350 harmful substances to keep you and your family safe from common textile chemicals.

data.name: Tallulah Sofa Gray
data.short_description: A low profile sets the stage for nighttime relaxation. The Tallulah upholstered sofa combines the straight lines of the European style with romantic details such as side cushions, crooked legs and nail heads. Square arm.

description.text: A low profile sets the stage for nighttime relaxation. The Tallulah upholstered sofa combines the straight lines of the European style with romantic details such as side cushions, crooked legs and nail heads. Square arm. Solid engineered solid wood frame. Down-filled cushions for a softer feel. Sinuous, non-sag steel springs provide shock absorbing support. The locked corner frame and mortise and tenon joinery provide exceptional structural integrity. The loose cushions are removable. Features antique brass nail head details. The removable legs have a vintage brown finish. Adjustable levelers provide stability on uneven floors.

specs.spec_value: Rotate the cushions and vacuum under them regularly. To avoid discoloration

description.text: The swivel mechanism allows the chair to rotate 360 degrees; does not tilt or turn. Fixed cushions. The frame is made of engineered wood and filled with 100% polyester fibers. Crown construction provides increased strength for increased durability. No sinuous sunken springs to provide cushion support. Created in the USA by our master craftsmen. Polyester wrapped cushions for a firmer feel. 2 back cushions included for added comfort.

specs.spec_value: Rotate the cushions and vacuum under them regularly. To avoid discoloration

data.name: Comfort Aquare Arm Sofa
data.short_description: Settle into this sofa just once and you'll know where it got its name from. Designed with extra deep seats and three layers of thick padding in the arms and backrest, it invites the whole family to relax together.

description.text: Settle into this sofa just once and you'll know where it got its name from. Designed with extra deep seats and three layers of thick padding in the arms and backrest, it invites the whole family to relax together. This successful collection offers customizable options from fabric to padding to cushion style. Choose cushions wrapped in polyester for a firmer feel.

data.name: Big Sur Modular Room
data.short_description: Casual and comfortable, our Big Sur collection has a modern profile with square arms, wide tapered feet; Generous proportions that are perfect for lounging. The cushions are loose.

description.text: Casual and comfortable, our Big Sur collection has a modern profile with square arms, wide tapered feet; Generous proportions that are perfect for lounging. The cushions are loose. The eco-friendly construction includes 70% recycled 8-gauge steel sinuous springs and seat cushions made with a soy-based foam core. Mortise and tenon joinery provides exceptional structural integrity. Winding steel springs provide cushion support. Hidden steel connectors hold modular parts together securely. Adjustable levelers provide stability on uneven surfaces. Made in the USA by our own master craftsman.

data.name: Pearce Modular Sofa Left Arm
data.short_description: The exceptional versatility of our Pearce collection allows you to create an intimate conversation area or a spacious seating arrangement. Distinguished by its generous rolled arms and bound seams, this modular room has a luxurious feel.

description.text: The exceptional versatility of our Pearce collection allows you to create an intimate conversation area or a spacious seating arrangement. Distinguished by its generous rolled arms and bound seams, this modular room has a luxurious feel. It has a curved arm. The removable legs are square tapered and finished in Espresso. The seat cushions are loose. Wood frame with mortise and tenon joinery provides exceptional structural integrity. Winding steel springs provide cushion support. Hidden steel connectors hold modular parts together securely. Adjustable levelers provide stability on uneven floors.

specs.spec_value: Includes 4 seat cushions and 5 back cushions

data.name: Farmhouse King Size Bed
data.short_description: Style, simplicity and fine craftsmanship are the hallmarks of classic Shaker furniture. We've updated the traditional profile of a four-post bed with simple straight lines and the warmth and appeal of an heirloom.

description.text: Style, simplicity and fine craftsmanship are the hallmarks of classic Shaker furniture. We've updated the traditional profile of a four-post bed with simple straight lines and the warmth and appeal of an heirloom. Masterfully crafted with kiln-dried meranti wood. Completely finished by hand, using a multi-step process that highlights the natural grain of the wood. The espresso-finished piece is crafted from kiln-dried rich mahogany to look like an heirloom. Charcoal finished parts are made from solid kiln-dried meranti wood, engineered wood, and sungkai veneers. GREENGUARD Gold Certification. GREENGUARD Gold Certificates have low emissions, which means they are designed to ensure that the air you and your family breathe is cleaner.

data.name: Studded Armchair Irving
data.short_description: Our compact version of the classic club chair offers all the comforts of the original, but in a small swivel silhouette that is suitable for a library, study or small room.

description.text: Our compact version of the classic club chair offers all the comforts of the original, but in a small swivel silhouette that is suitable for a library, study or small room. The cushions are wrapped in flame retardant free polyester, which gives it a firmer feel. Steel anti-sag springs provide cushioned support. Features attractive nail head accents. The swivel mechanism allows the chair to rotate 360 degrees; does not tilt or turn. Premium quality leather, dyed with aniline. The skin will soften and clear with use and the passage of time, developing an elegant patina. Leather is a natural product. Each skin has inherent variations in color and texture. No two pieces are alike.

specs.spec_value: 81 cm wide x 90 cm deep; 82.50 cm high. "
Although leather is one of the most durable upholstery materials

data.name: Dayton Queen Size Bed
data.short_description: Our Dayton platform bed is distinguished by a low profile and clean lines. Crafted from mango wood with incredible tonality and texture, the headboard features wooden planks arranged in a subtle chevron pattern.

description.text: Our Dayton platform bed is distinguished by a low profile and clean lines. Crafted from mango wood with incredible tonality and texture, the headboard features wooden planks arranged in a subtle chevron pattern for visual interest. Slim metal legs finished in antique bronze complete the look. Made with solid mango wood, acacia wood and MDF. The legs are made of metal. Finished with a multi-step process in Carbon Light. The headboard has beautiful parquet details. The roll-up slat support system makes the use of a bed base optional. A standard-size or low-profile bed frame can be used.

data.name: Chesterfield King Size Bed Gray
data.short_description: Our Chesterfield collection is built for superior comfort. The headboard is detailed with deep button tufts and decorative bronze rivets on each side. Expertly crafted with a kiln-dried hardwood frame.

description.text: Our Chesterfield collection is built for superior comfort. The headboard is detailed with deep button tufts and decorative bronze rivets on each side. Expertly crafted with a kiln-dried hardwood frame. The headboard is padded and upholstered. Exposed legs have a hand-applied Espresso finish. Adjustable levelers add stability on uneven surfaces. The headboard is guaranteed to fit our PB metal boxspring (sold separately) using the headboard hardware (included).

data.name: Oakleigh King Size Bed
data.short_description: Modern lines and rustic charms intersect in our new Oakleigh collection. Made in India, this beauty's slim silhouette and low profile bring a new perspective to traditional four-poster beds.

description.text: Modern lines and rustic charms intersect in our new Oakleigh collection. Made in India, this beauty's slim silhouette and low profile bring a new perspective to traditional four-poster beds. Masterfully crafted with solid mango wood and acacia wood. Completed in a multi-step process in Heirloom Wheat. The canopy is fixed and cannot be removed. A box spring is required. Adjustable levelers provide stability on uneven surfaces.

data.name: Paulsen Queen Size Bed
data.short_description: Rustic and relaxed. This bedroom collection is full of personality, and the unique nature of its reclaimed wood means that each piece is different.

description.text: Rustic and relaxed. This bedroom collection is full of personality, and the unique nature of its reclaimed wood means that each piece is different. No matter your style, it would look just as good in a lake house as it does in an urban loft. Expertly handcrafted from reclaimed pine wood with acacia slats. Kiln-dried wood helps prevent warping, splitting, cracking, and mold growth.

data.name: Livingston King Size Bed
data.short_description: The wood knots, texture and finish of the Livingston bed give it a worn and elegant look that looks classic in the room. Crafted from solid meranti wood with MDF and Sungkai veneers.

description.text: The wood knots, texture and finish of the Livingston bed give it a worn and elegant look that looks classic in the room. Crafted from solid meranti wood with MDF and Sungkai veneers. Features a matte gray wash finish. System of 5 central support legs.

specs.spec_value: Interior (for mattress): 1.97 m wide x 2.03 m long. Headboard: 1.35 m high x 11.43 cm thick. Footboard: 53 cm high x 7.62 cm thick. Sidebar to floor: 5 '' high. Weight: 65 kg. Illustrative set image

data.name: Linwood King Size Bed
data.short_description: Clean, straight lines give our Linwood Collection an attractive, straightforward style. The finish is detailed with contrasting vintage hardware for a nod to a vintage aesthetic.

description.text: Clean, straight lines give our Linwood Collection an attractive, straightforward style. The finish is detailed with contrasting vintage hardware for a nod to a vintage aesthetic. The bed sits close to the floor and features a thick footboard and upholstered headboard. Crafted from solid Meranti wood and Sungkai veneers with an upholstered panel. Features a hand-applied finish. Using veneers results in high-quality furniture that has flawless surfaces and consistent color tones that will not crack. All wood is kiln dried, a process that ensures furniture will never split, warp, crack or mold. The slat support system makes the use of a boxspring optional.

data.name: Morgan Armchair
data.short_description: Claim your favorite seat in the room. The Morgan upholstered armchair, luxurious, soft and cozy, invites you to enjoy his moments of leisure. A simple profile with English arms and spindle legs make it a stylish accessory.

description.text: Claim your favorite seat in the room. The Morgan upholstered armchair, luxurious, soft and cozy, invites you to enjoy his moments of leisure. A simple profile with English arms and spindle legs make it a stylish addition to any room. This seat is made in our North Carolina factory by master craftsmen. Adjusted seat pad. Seat cushion with polyester core. Needle punched low-melt fiber pad. A kiln-dried hardwood frame with mortise and tenon joinery give it exceptional structural integrity. The detachable cylindrical hardwood legs are finished in an espresso color. Interlocking polyester fabric strips provide cushion support. Made in America by our master craftsmen.

data.name: Oakleigh Nightstand
data.short_description: Modern lines and rustic charms intersect in our new Oakleigh collection. Made in India, the sleek silhouette and low profile of this bureau bring a new perspective to classic bedroom design.

description.text: Modern lines and rustic charms intersect in our new Oakleigh collection. Made in India, the sleek silhouette and low profile of this bureau bring a new perspective to classic bedroom design. An open shelf and bottom drawer add elegant order to your nighttime essentials. Made of mango wood and birch MDF. Features 1 drawer and 1 shelf for additional storage. Iron drawer handles with black finish. MDF is a wood composed of fibers that provides exceptional strength and ensures the structural integrity of the product over time. Drawers feature French cut dovetail joinery and metal hafele ball bearing drawer glides, ensuring smooth movement. Adjustable levelers provide stability on uneven floors.
